title: slab serif used on "brand new" website by armin
content:
i really like the logo, simple, chunky, elegant. i know it’s a slab serif, but can’t seem to find the exact one. any help is greatly appreciated! thank you

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090927124549/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_296.png) | 9.11 KB |
author: conflagrated

comments.content: [http://www.typophile.com/node/40781](http://web.archive.org/web/20090927124549/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40781 "http://www.typophile.com/node/40781") – a quick search turned this up.
THANK YOU! i did a search for “brand new” and even used site:typophile.com on google but clearly i did it wrong. sorry for the double post and thanks again for your help!
No worries. Not sure why your search didn’t turn up anything. I just typed “brand new slab” into the search field here.
